summary: Wishing to become a successful Reggae singer, a young Jamaican man finds himself tied to corrupt record producers and drug pushers.
cast: Jimmy Cliff|Janet Bartley|Carl Bradshaw|Ras Daniel Hartman|Basil Keane|Bob Charlton|Winston Stona|Lucia White|Volair Johnson|Beverly Anderson|Clover Lewis|Elijah Chambers|Prince Buster|Ed 'Bim' Lewis|Bobby Loban|Joanne Dunn|Adrian Robinson|Don Topping|Karl Leslie|Sandra Redwood|Ula Fraser|Carol Lawes|Aston 'Bam' Winter|Toots Hibbert|Franco Nero
title: Caiga quien caiga
